fields.System.Title: Update the migration tooling decision tree to reflect VMWare migration options
fields.System.Description: Download and modify the migration tool decision tree to align to your expanded migration processes https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/decision-guides/migrate-decision-guide/

fields.System.Title: Evaluate migration options used to migrate the first host
fields.System.Description: Determine which approaches are to be supported during iterative migration processes

fields.System.Title: Migrate VMs using backup and disaster recovery tools
fields.System.Description: https://docs.azure.cloudsimple.com/migrate-workloads/#migrate-vms-using-backup-and-disaster-recovery-tools

fields.System.Title: Migrate VMs using NSX Layer 2 VPN
fields.System.Description: https://docs.azure.cloudsimple.com/migrate-workloads/#migrate-vms-using-nsx-layer-2-vpn

fields.System.Title: Migrate VMs using PowerCLI
fields.System.Description: https://docs.azure.cloudsimple.com/migrate-workloads/#migrate-vms-using-powercli

fields.System.Title: Migrate ISOs and Templates
fields.System.Description: https://docs.azure.cloudsimple.com/migrate-workloads/#migrate-isos-and-templates

fields.System.Title: Prerequisites
fields.System.Description: https://docs.azure.cloudsimple.com/migrate-workloads/#prerequisites

fields.System.Title: Configure workload DNS and DHCP setup
fields.System.Description: https://docs.azure.cloudsimple.com/dns-dhcp-setup/

fields.System.Title: Configure on-premises DNS for private cloud
fields.System.Description: https://docs.azure.cloudsimple.com/on-premises-dns-setup/

fields.System.Title: Escalate private cloud privileges
fields.System.Description: https://docs.azure.cloudsimple.com/escalate-privileges/

fields.System.Title: Document configuration
fields.System.Description: Document Configuration of the VM in the User Story

fields.System.Title: Secure and Manage
fields.System.Description:
Ideally governance, security, and operations have each been factored into the operating model for your cloud environments. If they have not, take a moment to validate security and management constraints for this asset.
Guide: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/secure-and-manage
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/secure-and-manage/

fields.System.Title: Optimize workload(s)
fields.System.Description:
Test, measure performance, and optimize workloads. When ready promote the workload to production
Guide: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/optimize-and-transform
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/

fields.System.Title: Migrate
fields.System.Description:
Leverage the define migration solution to automate migration of the asset to the cloud. This step may be best executed as a single task for all assets associated with this workload.
Guide https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/migrate
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/migrate/

fields.System.Title: Assess
fields.System.Description:
Evaluate readiness, architecture, cost, and appropriate migration tooling
Guide: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/assess
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/assess/
Decision Tree: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/decision-guides/migrate-decision-guide/

fields.System.Title: Document configuration
fields.System.Description: Document Configuration of the VM in the User Story

fields.System.Title: Secure and Manage
fields.System.Description:
Ideally governance, security, and operations have each been factored into the operating model for your cloud environments. If they have not, take a moment to validate security and management constraints for this asset.
Guide: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/secure-and-manage
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/secure-and-manage/

fields.System.Title: Optimize workload(s)
fields.System.Description:
Test, measure performance, and optimize workloads. When ready promote the workload to production
Guide: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/optimize-and-transform
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/

fields.System.Title: Migrate
fields.System.Description:
Leverage the define migration solution to automate migration of the asset to the cloud. This step may be best executed as a single task for all assets associated with this workload.
Guide https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/migrate
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/migrate/

fields.System.Title: Assess
fields.System.Description:
Evaluate readiness, architecture, cost, and appropriate migration tooling
Guide: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/assess
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/assess/
Decision Tree: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/decision-guides/migrate-decision-guide/

fields.System.Title: Update the adoption plan
fields.System.Description: Update the migration plan with any process or task changes based on the first workload

fields.System.Title: Review Best Practices
fields.System.Description: Review migration best practices to identify additional technical requirements that would aid in the success of your migration effort: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-best-practices/

fields.System.Title: Review Expanded Scope Checklist
fields.System.Description: Review the expanded scope checklist to identify any scope requirements which would cause significant deviations from the Azure Migration Guide: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/expanded-scope/

fields.System.Title: Select the first workload
fields.System.Description: Select a first workload that is suitable as a trial run or pilot of your migration process. https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/digital-estate/rationalize#selecting-the-first-workload

fields.System.Title: Azure Migration Guide
fields.System.Description: Follow the Azure Migration Guide to deploy the first workload in the cloud adoption plan. https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/?tabs=Overview

fields.System.Title: Change approval process
fields.System.Description: Approve proposed changes with necessary change control mechanisms: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/assess/approve

fields.System.Title: Migration tool choice(s)
fields.System.Description: Evaluate the approach to migrate the workload based on future state architecture decisions https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/decision-guides/migrate-decision-guide/

fields.System.Title: Estimate Cloud Costs
fields.System.Description: Estimate cost of the proposed workload. Update the business justification and budget accordingly. https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/assess/estimate

fields.System.Title: Architect workload
fields.System.Description: Define future state architecture for the workload: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/assess/architect

fields.System.Title: Evaluate workload and asset readiness
fields.System.Description: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/assess/evaluate

fields.System.Title: Create timelines
fields.System.Description: Create timelines to align expectations across the business and IT teams.

fields.System.Title: Define iterations and releases
fields.System.Description: Update the iteration path of each workload to define iterations of work and iterations of production workload releases.

fields.System.Title: Align assets to workloads
fields.System.Description: Ensure that all assets are aligned to at least one workload

fields.System.Title: Prioritize workloads
fields.System.Description: Define and prioritize workloads in the backlog

fields.System.Title: Decommission
fields.System.Description: Terminate or resuse the allocated resources https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/decommission

fields.System.Title: Workload monitoring period
fields.System.Description: Monitor application performance for a period of time to validate that the application is free of unplanned dependencies on decommissioned assets https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/decommission

fields.System.Title: Power down assets
fields.System.Description: Turn off existing VMs https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/decommission

fields.System.Title: Promotion
fields.System.Description: Re-route production traffic to deployed assets https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/promote

fields.System.Title: Final test
fields.System.Description: Validate availability of all assets before production

fields.System.Title: Governance Review
fields.System.Description: Validate adherence to governance or compliance requirements https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/promote

fields.System.Title: Security Review
fields.System.Description: Validate adherence to security baseline https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/promote

fields.System.Title: Network dependencies
fields.System.Description: Validate network traffic based on scale test to identify unplanned dependencies https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/promote

fields.System.Title: Document change
fields.System.Description: Record the change in sizing in the parent feature, along with the reason for change

fields.System.Title: Adjust sizing
fields.System.Description: Change the size of the deployed asset https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/optimize

fields.System.Title: Decide on optimization timing
fields.System.Description: Decide if testing is sufficient to optimize (Or if optimization should happen after promotion) https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/optimize

fields.System.Title: Review test results
fields.System.Description: Review results of the workload test to evaluate data and proper sizing https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/optimize

fields.System.Title: Scale Test
fields.System.Description: Execute the test at scale to test asset performance under load.

fields.System.Title: Create/select automated test
fields.System.Description: Use an existing test or create a test script based on power user testing.

fields.System.Title: Manual test with power users
fields.System.Description: Observe power users from the business performing manual validation of the workload https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/business-test

fields.System.Title: Set up Azure Monitor to track performance
fields.System.Description: Implement Azure monitor to track CPU, Memory, and other performance metrics on VMs

fields.System.Title: Document configuration
fields.System.Description: Document Configuration of the VM in the User Story

fields.System.Title: Secure and Manage
fields.System.Description:
Ideally governance, security, and operations have each been factored into the operating model for your cloud environments. If they have not, take a moment to validate security and management constraints for this asset.
Guide: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/secure-and-manage
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/secure-and-manage/

fields.System.Title: Optimize workload(s)
fields.System.Description:
Test, measure performance, and optimize workloads. When ready promote the workload to production
Guide: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/optimize-and-transform
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/optimize/

fields.System.Title: Migrate
fields.System.Description:
Leverage the define migration solution to automate migration of the asset to the cloud. This step may be best executed as a single task for all assets associated with this workload.
Guide https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/migrate
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/migrate/

fields.System.Title: Assess
fields.System.Description:
Evaluate readiness, architecture, cost, and appropriate migration tooling
Guide: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/assess
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/assess/
Decision Tree: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/decision-guides/migrate-decision-guide/

fields.System.Title: Environment readiness (Landing Zone)
fields.System.Description: Has the cloud migration target been established? Are the necessary migration tools in place? Has a resource organization and naming standard been set for this workload's assets? https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/prerequisites/planning-checklist

fields.System.Title: Roles and Responsibilities
fields.System.Description: The various functions required during this migration are represented by one or more members of the team. https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/prerequisites/culture-complexity

fields.System.Title: Decisions
fields.System.Description: Evaluate decisions that impact migration efforts: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/prerequisites/decisions
